actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.
Committee on Banking requested executive comment from Commerce Department; Agriculture Department.
Subcommittee on International Finance (Banking). Hearings held.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Finance and Monetary Policy

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970, to prohibit restrictions on the export of certain agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1970 to prohibit the President from restricting the export of an agricultural commodity sought to be exported under an export sales contract: (1) entered into before the President announces an export restriction on the commodity; and (2) reported pursuant to a specified section of the Agricultural Act of 1970. Permits the President to restrict exports of such a commodity during a declared war or national emergency.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970, to prohibit restrictions on the export of certain agricultural commodities.
